title: SHOCK IN LA: Celebrities Learn What ACLJ Has Known for Years
itunes:title: SHOCK IN LA: Celebrities Learn What ACLJ Has Known for Years
description: Following Kanye West's recent antisemitic comments, demonstrators in Los Angeles just hung banners over a freeway with one of them reading "Kanye is right about the Jews". Logan and the Sekulow team break down the spate of antisemitic hatred following West's statements and the reaction by Hollywood stars. This and more today on Sekulow.
content:encoded: Following Kanye West's recent antisemitic comments, demonstrators in Los Angeles just hung banners over a freeway with one of them reading "Kanye is right about the Jews".
